details.projectTitle: Website Design for Marketing Agency Startup
details.description: A modern and responsive website built using React for Add-god.com. The project focuses on seamless user experience, fast loading speeds, and intuitive navigation. The website is designed to attract and engage users, driving traffic and conversions. The project also includes SEO optimization to enhance search engine visibility.

The website is optimized for speed, performance, and user engagement. The project also includes social media integration for brand promotion.

details.projectTitle: Website Design for ADD-GOD Marketing Agency
details.description: A dynamic services website developed with React. The platform provides a user-friendly interface, interactive elements, and robust backend integration. The website is designed to showcase services, attract clients, and drive conversions. The project also includes SEO optimization for better visibility.

details.projectTitle: CRM Design for ADD-GOD Marketing Agency
details.description: A powerful CRM platform developed using the MERN stack. It includes features such as lead tracking, data analytics, and customer management tools. The project focuses on user experience, data security, and scalability. The CRM is designed to streamline operations, improve efficiency, and drive business growth through data-driven insights.

allProjects.title: Google Map Listing
allProjects.subTitle: SEO, Google My Business, Local SEO

details.projectTitle: Google My Business Optimization for ADD-God
details.description: This project focuses on optimizing Google My Business (GMB) listings to enhance local visibility and improve search rankings. By leveraging SEO techniques, accurate business information, and engaging content, the listing gained higher reach and credibility. The strategy included optimizing NAP (Name, Address, Phone), responding to customer reviews, and integrating Google Maps for easy navigation. The goal was to drive more traffic, generate leads, and boost business presence online.
details.languages: SEO Strategies, Google My Business Tools

allProjects.title: GMB & SEO of ADDGOD Website
allProjects.subTitle: Search Engine Optimization, Digital Marketing, Web Performance

details.description: A comprehensive SEO strategy implemented for ADDGOD, enhancing search engine rankings, organic traffic, and online visibility. The optimization included on-page SEO (meta tags, keyword research, content optimization), technical SEO (site speed improvements, mobile-friendliness, structured data), and off-page SEO (backlink building, Google My Business optimization). The project resulted in improved search rankings, increased website traffic, and better engagement rates.

allExperience.companyDescription: Full-stack experience developing end-to-end web apps that integrate both front-end and back-end technologies to provide a consistent and powerful user experience.Front-end development: Creating visually appealing, responsive, and interactive user interfaces with modern web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks (React.js), delivering a consistent user experience across all devices.Back-end mastery: Creating efficient server-side logic, maintaining databases like MySQL and MongoDB, and designing APIs that allow for seamless communication between server and client.API integration: Creating strong, scalable APIs that connect front-end interfaces to back-end services, streamlining data flow and increasing overall application efficiency.Performance optimization: Capable of debugging and fine-tuning programs to achieve maximum performance, scalability, and responsiveness, resulting in smooth, real-time interaction.Collaboration: Working together with UI/UX designers, product teams, and stakeholders to provide intuitive, user-centric solutions that are suited to specific company objectives and goals.Holistic problem-solving: Combining technical expertise and creativity to address complex development challenges and constantly enhance online applications using best practices for performance, security, and scalability..

From March 2024 to September 2024, I worked as a Technical Recruiter at Headfield Company, Noida, where I was responsible for conducting technical interviews for USA-based IT candidates. My role involved screening, evaluating, and shortlisting candidates, primarily for Cognizant, ensuring they met the required technical competencies. I assessed candidates' coding skills, problem-solving abilities, and technical knowledge, aligning them with client expectations. Additionally, I collaborated with hiring managers to streamline the recruitment process, provided detailed interview feedback, and facilitated smooth communication between candidates and hiring teams.

My time at SingleInterface was a pivotal moment in my career. As a Front-End Developer, I was responsible for designing and implementing a variety of templates that improved the company's web presence. Over the course of three months, I studied the complexities of front-end development, honing my skills and earning significant experience.During this position, I investigated and mastered a number of critical tools and technologies. I learned SASS, which helped me manage and arrange stylesheets more efficiently. I also used Lighthouse to analyze and optimize web page performance, as well as understand the foundations of SEO to improve our projects' visibility and searchability.One of the most important lessons I learned from this experience was how to build clean, useful code that not only respects technical standards but also matches with user demands and business objectives. The encouraging workplace environment and collaborative attitude enhanced my learning experience, making this internship an important milestone in my progress.

allTestimonial.reviewText: The service was outstanding! The team was professional, responsive, and delivered exactly what we needed. Our website traffic increased significantly after their optimizations.
I‚Äôm beyond impressed with the results. The design is sleek, the functionality is smooth, and everything was completed ahead of schedule. Highly recommended!
